entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
